question: Who among the following leaders led Chenchus revolt in Nallamalla hills?
explanation: The Chenchus revolt (Nallamala Hills (AP): The tribal people of Nallamala Hills revolted against British forest laws under theÂ  leadership of k. Hanumanthu in 1921-22. He orgainsed Palanadu - Forest Satyagraha against British Forest Laws. Their revolt was against the increasing British control over forests.
